EmailTemplate.name: NorthAm_Event_ChicagoOfficeOpening_Q115.Registration Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: You are confirmed to attend Pivotal Chicago Grand Office Opening (January 29)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
REGISTRATION CONFIRMATION Hello {{lead.First Name:default=}},
Thank you for registering for Pivotal Chicago Grand Office Opening. See event details below.
Date: Thursday, January 29, 2015 Time: 6pm - 9pm Location: Pivotal Office <https://www.google.com/maps/place/222+W+Merchandise+Mart+Plaza+%231214,+Chicago,+IL+60654/@41.8883695,-87.6353645,17z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m2!3m1!1s0x880e2cb6fb232d35:0xea0fa25ca30f1303>, 222 Merchandise Mart Plaza Suite 1214, Chicago, IL 60654
{{my.Save the Date:default=edit me}}
Should you have any questions or would like more information, please email elogue@pivotal.io <mailto:elogue@pivotal.io>. See you on Thursday, January 29th!
Sincerely, The Pivotal Team
